title: Blanka & Candy, in association with Veer, present '50' in NYC.
content:
[http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1208/1345452419\_04c3511b43\_o.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007191804/http:/farm2.static.flickr.com/1208/1345452419_04c3511b43_o.gif "http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1208/1345452419\_04c3511b43\_o.gif")

PLEASE TELL ANYONE YOU KNOW WILL BE IN NYC TO POP IN.  
Upcoming locations: Leeds / Newcastle / Sheffield / Dublin / Paris & more.

++++

Blanka and Candy  
in association with Veer present ‘50’  
celebrating 50 years of Helvetica

50 image makers, 50 original works  
50x50cm, each in an edition of 50  
Epson archival Giclee prints  
£50 each via blanka.co.uk

[The Brief]  
Each artist was allocated a random year [1957 - 2006] from  
Helvetica’s lifetime. From this they were asked to illustrate an  
event of creative or cultural significance which occured during their  
allocated year. There were no other rules applied other than if they  
used a typeface it must be Helvetica of of their own hand.

Helvetica 50  
at Espeis Gallery  
90 Wythe Avenue (at n. 11th st.)  
Williamsburg, Brooklyn  
New York City

[http://www.espeis.nu](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007191804/http:/www.espeis.nu/ "http://www.espeis.nu")  
e: [hola@espeis.nu](mailto:hola@espeis.nu)

Opening: September 15th, 7pm  
With music by Activaire.

Supported by Epson, Commonwealth, GF Smith, Generation Press, Activaire, Build & Victionary.

+++++

Contributors: 1957 Spin 1958 Vince Frost 1959 Bleed 1960 Ros Shiers  
1961 The Designers Republic 1962 Farrow 1963 Antoine et Manuel 1964  
Ian Wright 1965 Fabio Ongarato 1966 Experimental Jetset 1967 Parra  
1968 Kam Tang 1969 Build 1970 Hamish Muir 1971 Fred Flade 1972 Ben  
Drury 1973 Darren Firth 1974 James Jarvis 1975 Rinzen 1976 Airside  
1977 Niklaus Troxler 1978 Jonathan Ellery 1979 Oliver Jeffers 1980  
Glenn Leyburn 1981 Barber Osgerby 1982 Alan Kitching 1983 Conor &  
David 1984 Michael Gillette 1985 NB: Studio 1986 North 1987 Cartlidge  
Levene 1988 Luca Ionescu 1989 Jenny Mörtsell 1990 Emmi 1991 Marc  
Atlan 1992 Alexander Gelman 1993 Hellovon 1994 Image Now 1995 Neue  
1996 Kiosk 1997 Kim Hiorthøy 1998 Genevieve Gauckler 1999 Adrian  
Shaughnessy 2000 Winkreative 2001 Commonwealth 2002 Angry/Aad 2003  
Phunkstudio 2004 Luke Prowse 2005 Vaughan Oliver 2006 Rob Ryan

View the show here  
 [http://www.candycollective.com/50](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007191804/http:/www.candycollective.com/50 "http://www.candycollective.com/50")

Buy some prints here  
 [http://blanka.co.uk/50\_years\_of\_helvetica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007191804/http:/blanka.co.uk/50_years_of_helvetica/ "http://blanka.co.uk/50\_years\_of\_helvetica/")

+++++

[http://www.candycollective.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007191804/http:/www.candycollective.com/ "http://www.candycollective.com")

author: CandyCulture

comments.content:
This is great news! I am in NYC for a week and couldn’t make the exhibition in London, so this works out perfectly.

Can anyone recommend any further places a typophile/designer would need to visit before heading home?

Chad
